attributes.action: Call on the HMRC to look again at their decision to change the SED rules.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
HMRC have change their rules regarding the SED, they appear to have made the decision on an appeal againts a Semi Submersible tax claims.

 Also applying the ruling retrospectively, this is grossly unfair and wouldnot happen for any other tax payer in the UK.

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence:

http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/MerchantSED/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
